<div class="cnn_strycntntlft">
<!--startclickprintexclude-->
<div class="cnn_strylftcntnt"><div class="cnn_strylctcntr">

<ul class="cnn_bulletbin cnnStryHghLght"><!--google_ad_section_start--><li>A spokesman confirms Gov. Carlos Soria's death, but does not provide additional details</li>
<li>State media reports that he was shot in the face</li>
<li>Soria, 61, became governor in Rio Negro in December</li>
<!--google_ad_section_end-->
</ul></div></div>
<!--endclickprintexclude--><!--google_ad_section_start--><!--startclickprintinclude-->
<p><strong>Buenos Aires (CNN)</strong> -- Authorities were investigating Sunday after a gunshot wound to the face killed the governor of Argentina's Rio Negro province, state media reported.</p>
<p>The shooting occurred around 4:45 a.m. Sunday in Gov. Carlos Soria's official residence, the state-run Telam news agency reported.</p>
<p>A province spokesman confirmed his death, but did not provide additional details about the shooting, the agency said.</p>
<p>Soria, 61, became the provincial governor December 10 after a political career that spanned decades and included stints as a national lawmaker and the head of Argentina's intelligence agency, Telam said.</p>
<p class="cnn_strycbftrtxt">CNN's Claudia Dominguez contributed to this report.</p>
<!--endclickprintinclude--><!--google_ad_section_end-->
